features: THE BIDET FOR SOUTHPAWS: The SouthSpa Dual Nozzle Bidet is for left-handed people and anyone in need of a bidet attachment with controls on the left side. Operation is simple and intuitive, water pressure can be easily adjusted by turning the smooth dial and the nozzles are positionable ensuring a thorough and precise clean. Say no to toilet paper with the SouthSpa for a better clean.

QUALITY COMPONENTS: Thoughtfully designed with the highest quality components, the SouthSpa comes with an all metal t-valve, metal braided hose, and the patented Unibody construction and ceramic core valve makes pressure control smooth and easy while reducing the risk of leaks.
EASY INSTALLATION: Everything needed for installation is included, works on all toilets, and installs in minutes with no tools or plumber required.

CHOOSE BRONDELL: For over 14 years Brondell has been making bidet attachments, bidet sprayers, shattafs, diaper sprayers, bidet toilet seats, Swash electronic bidet toilet seats, travel bidets, and healthy home products using the highest-quality materials available. Brondell is focused on delivering a healthy home experience in every room of your house, with products that feature a unique blend of the latest technology and modern design, with eco-friendly packaging.

PEACE OF MIND: Unlike some competitors who list many features at suspect prices (almost always resulting in poor quality and inadequate product support), Brondell offers the most possible features without ever comprising the products' integrity. With Brondell you are making the best choice possible for overall product quality, features, value, and - most importantly - support. The SouthSpa dual nozzle bidet attachment is backed by Brondell and their industry leading Customer Support based in San

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A better clean from from front to rear. SouthSpa’s two spray nozzles ensure precise front and rear washes for a complete cleaning experience. Each nozzle can be manually adjusted to fine-tune washes to you. The right wash for every body. SouthSpa is specifically designed for lefties, or bathrooms with limited right-hand space. Washing and nozzle cleaning is easy thanks to the simple, two-knob control. The small knob controls water pressure and nozzle cleaning, while the large knob adjusts for front and rear washes. Healthy for you, healthy for the planet. Because SouthSpa runs only on water and needs no electricity to operate, every wash is a more sustainable alternative to toilet paper and wipes. In short? You’re saving trees, water, and energy. An easy upgrade with quality components. SouthSpa features a slim profile that installs directly under your existing toilet seat. And with quality components like a braided-metal hose and all-metal T-Valve, it’s built to last.

Brondell SouthSpa LH-12 LumaWarm L60 SouthSpa LH-22 Nebia VivaSpring CSF-PC Bidet Towels Left-side control panel ✓ ✓ N/A N/A Retractable, self-cleaning nozzles ✓ ✓ N/A N/A Warm water washes ✓ N/A N/A Heated seat ✓ N/A N/A Details Meet the bidet attachment for lefties and toilets with limited right-hand space. The SouthSpa Essential uses two nozzles for targeted front and rear washes. Easy to install under your existing toilet seat and no electricity required. Lumawarm raises the bar on bathroom luxury, featuring 3 adjustable heat temperature settings, illuminating LED nightlight, and a gentle-close seat and lid. A bidet attachment designed for lefties and toilets with limited right-hand space. SouthSpa Advanced features 2 nozzles and warm water capability, and installs under your existing toilet seat without the need for electricity. Enjoy cleaner showers with filtered water. High-quality KDF material reduces chemicals like chlorine, lead, and more. Installs easily onto any standard shower arm—no tools or plumbing experience required. Cut back on toilet paper waste with a set of 6 luxuriously soft bamboo bidet towels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Purchase Ever! Suffered from Medical Condition 20+ years, Not Anymore!
reviews.reviewText: I don't know where to start with this purchase. All i can say it's the best purchase i ever made! I wished i had purchased this 25 years ago when i started having issues with wiping. I suffered nonstop from a medical condition(s), chronic hemorrhoids, scars, rashes, 2 colonoscopy's, and multiple issues down in that rear dark region. Almost daily I was in agony and constantly late for work due to wiping issues, and would schedule everything around wiping the b-spot. That was 2 decades of agony. Then came the pandemic 2020 and ordered a bidet due to the TP shortage, but it never arrived due to mail issues and the shortage of bidets. Then in 2021 I had an accident that left me in agony and pain with my right arm and shoulder. I finally had shoulder surgery Jan 2022, and two weeks prior ordered this bidet, THEN one week before installed it! Real easy to install except that i had to replace my old stiff copper pipe with a 12" flex pipe, but that was one easy trip to the hardware store. No problem, no leaks, no issues, works perfect! Love the left nozzle since my right shoulder surgery, it's been a huge blessing! I can't speak words good enough for all the benefits this bidet has brought...it's refreshing, clean, no more mess, no chronic issues, and when I have a flare up it's easy and clean. I use 90% less TP, and look forward to "me time" on the throne. I feel like a King and cleaner than one too! We Love it so much ordered a second one for her too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and perfect
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a bidet for a couple of years and like it much better than toilet paper! This is the 4th unit I have tried and it is the best one as far as performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install but Very Strong (Not for the Feint of Heart!)
reviews.reviewText: This bidet was easier to install than I anticipated! Honestly the hardest of the whole project was figuring out how to shut off my water supply (which ended up with me calling maintenance because I couldn’t figure it out). The instructional video was super helpful and I was able to install the bidet in less than 20 minutes with no leaks and ease of use. I will warn you though, the sprayer on this bidet is quite powerful and will definitely shock you at first. I would definitely warn guests before they use it too (as I’m writing this and cackling, I can hear my partner screaming bloody murder across the apartment and I feel bad for not warning him)! Overall, I would definitely recommend this bidet but wish there was a feature for a softer spray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bidet works well
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice. The hot water was hooked up with a hard plastic . My installer didn’t like it but it worked okay

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: visited my brother and he had one of these on his toilet, i tried it and loved it....i now wonder why i went my whole life without one of these......takes a few times of usage to get use to it but the feeling of being completely clean is wonderful. i did have to change water line coming from wall into toilet as mine was a solid line and you will need a flexible line but no problem just bought one at local ace hardware for $8.00 and removed old line slipped new line on. p.s i am a 77 year old woman so that tells you how easy it is to do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should have got this a long time ago
reviews.reviewText: This was super easy to install. The only tools I used were tools to remove my toilet seat. I hand tightened all the connections ( hoses ) only. I only used the provided Teflon tape for the T connector that goes on the bottom of the connector to the valve from the wall. I really don't think I needed to use it at all to be honest. I would say it took me a half hour in total to install. That's getting my tool bag out, removing the debris ( box and packaging ) and such. My tip to you, use YouTube as a great guide. The videos on YouTube may not all be this particular bidet. but they are a great guide. Everyone does not have the same toilet or toilet seat, so tools maybe different. The only tool I used was a 1/2" box wrench for removal/install of my seat. No leaks at all after install.The bidet itself works fantastic! I was very impressed by how well it worked. I will be saving a small fortune in toilet paper now. My wife loves it , I do wish it had the front nozzle for cleaning a woman's Y area. The model I bought will only clean the brown bullseye, but it does a very good job. The water pressure is strong enough to get a good blast of water at it. Some people say it's too powerful, but you can control the amount of water pressure with the control knob. I bought the simple one, the Brondell South spa, with only one control knob.If you know how to use a screwdriver ( most seats use a big screwdriver for removal ), know how to follow step by step instructions ( again use YouTube ) then you too can install this to your toilet. Also, you will still need toilet paper to pat your bottom dry from the water. But only one good pat should do the trick. You will feel much cleaner now with this bidet than using just toilet paper. I would recommend getting a bidet in every one of your bathrooms if you have more than one in your home. Just keep in mind the distance between your toilet to wall or cabinet. You may need the controls on the left side, like I did cause of the sink cabinet in the way, or the right side.

I bought the southpaw because I did not have enough room on the right side for the controls. Also, this adapted to a top mount toilet seat , no tightening bolts are available underneath the toilet. Once I added the bidet, I also need to get longer screws to attach both the bidet and the original toilet seat. Other than this, the installation was pretty easy. The water pressure is amazing and you really don’t need to turn the dial very far to achieve a good spray of water! Very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 1, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Simply brilliant . Cant imagine life without it
Works exactly as promised. And very esy to install.

Tuvimos que llamar a alguien para que lo atorara de la boquilla de modo que siempre esté abajo por que se atoraba y no bajaba, no es lo mas cómodo por que tienes que acomodarte para que funcione pero ayuda.
